ModMetaData.name: Dubs Heat Pumps
ModMetaData.author: Sh0tybumbati
ModMetaData.description:
Adds advanced heat pump systems to Dub's Bad Hygiene climate control. These intelligent split-type air conditioners automatically switch between heating and cooling modes based on room temperature, providing year-round climate control with minimal user intervention.
Features: - Split-type heat pump system with indoor and outdoor units - Automatic mode switching with ±2°C temperature threshold - Manual override via color-coded mode toggle button (orange for heating, blue for cooling) - Heating automatically disabled below -25°C outdoor temperature to prevent damage - Multiple power modes for precise temperature control - Seamlessly integrates with Dub's Bad Hygiene Air duct system - Capacity bar displays current heating/cooling output
Requires Dub's Bad Hygiene to function.
